effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.

short_effect.x_y: Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.x_y: The user cuts its target with sharp shells. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user cuts its target with sharp shells. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.
